title: PermaBan after 7 years
body: riot please give me my account back ,i I have been playing for yearss, and put up with an amount of  flaming for years. I reply to them and I get the perma banned. I am not saying i didn't say anything wrong, I did and I apologize in public on this board and promise to not engage in it ever again. The internet is not the wild west it used to be, people get hurt feelings now, i see that. Please riot, unban my account, please, i will reform my playstyle and i promise i wont flame or i wont being toxic on any one please return my account riot. I have been playing since the BETA, and invested into your company, i refuse to use any other account after all these years of my loyalty.

replies.body: How long you've played and how many cosmetic items you've gotten doesn't change anything. A new account and 7 year account can and will be banned for the same reasons. Either way. Doing what Broporo here has said is the way to go.

It's good that you're able to see that fighting fire with fire isn't always the best way to go about things. I'm also proud you decided to come to a public forum and out yourself asking for forgiveness! There's not a lot I can do on my own for bans of this type, but your actions are commendable! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we can go fully into detail about what was said in those games and we might be able to help out.
